title: This website is no longer available
cleaned_text: This website is no longer available We are sorry the Protect Purdue site is no longer available. Students who are seeking primary care for both acute and chronic medical conditions may schedule through the Purdue University Student Health Services [patient portal](https://myhealth.push.purdue.edu) or by calling 765-494-1700. Faculty and staff seeking support for COVID-19 will need to work with their primary care provider or the Center for Healthy Living.
